name: KaNoBu
description:
This is a cut demo version of mobile game for Android (made with Godot engine).
Full version is already available on Play Market for free. Check it out!

What it is?

Rock, paper, scissors... Just more adventurous, with astonishing ambience, lots of achievements and easters. There are three in-built languages: English, Russian, Kazakh.

How to play?

Touch and swipe to send your projectile towards enemy. Rules are the same as in classic game.

Does it feel cool?

You bet! Pickup items (hearts and sandglasses) help you last longer, whereas unique bonuses (not always positive... ) bring a little bit of excitement into the game. Various achievements infuence the gameplay, while you can infuence those achievements! 

What's next?

Begin your adventure. GO! KA-NO-BU!
